main.name: Erarica
main.description: Software Engineer, Programmer, avid reader, traveller and Web 3.0 enthusiast
main.bio: Hi there! I am Erarica! I've been coding for over 4 years now. I am fluent in Java, Javascript, React, Node, MySql, Redis, RabbitMQ, AWS, Cassandra to name a few. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. My most recent work experience was with Amazon Robotics where I worked on a Co-op for 6 months. Beyond my technical skills, I'm actively involved in extracurricular activities. As a Teaching Assistant at Northeastern University, I mentored student project teams, fostering their growth and development. At Generate Build Studio, I led the Website Vision Team, overseeing recruitment, task allocation, and code reviews, while focusing on improving user experiences.

education.degree: Master of Science, Software Engineering Systems

extracurricular.title: Teching Assistant
extracurricular.description: Mentored 10 student project teams to build a Web 2.0 application using java and Object Oriented Principles, proctored and graded midterms

extracurricular.company: Generate Product Development Studio, Northeastern University
extracurricular.title: Project Lead
extracurricular.description: Interviewed engineers and designers to be recruited, divided and allocate tasks and performed code reviews. Improved user experience of the application and helped build responsive web pages

work.title: SDE Co-op
work.description1: Built an AWS Lambda solution using boto3 library to automatically onboard data from a Data Lake to AWS Lake Formation, eliminating need to manually onboard data and resulting in more than 90% reduction in time
work.description2: Conceptualized the architecture of a Data Governance and Discoverability solution, empowering customers to easily explore tables, along with their associated data lineage, eliminating the need to reach out to the support team by 90%
work.description3: Employed Figma to craft high-fidelity prototypes, offering a visually compelling representation of the solution

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description1: Implemented an Inventory Analysis tool to extract, transform and load e-commerce data. Devised a high-performance data model in Apache Cassandra to capture raw data and store analyzed data. Created jobs in Apache Spark to remodel raw data to analyzed datasets to gather relevant insights on sales and unique purchases
work.description2: Integrated Payment gateways: Paypal and MangoPay, into the e-commerce platform
work.description3: Improved performance of the Search functionality using Apache Solr, resulting in 75% accurate results in half the time

work.title: Assistant Systems Engineer
work.description1: Restructured and maintained APIs for MY Vodafone App to receive search request, look for possible prepaid and postpaid plans by calling the web service and create a response for the mobile application in JSON format, thereby reducing the time taken by the request by 30%

projects.title: Figma Designs: Twitter integration with Amazon ecosystem
Figma Designs: Explore, a community app

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
